GetReportApplyData.Sql: select rw_report_log.rep_id,rep_name,func_use,COUNT(*) counts from rw_report_log left join rw_report_main on rw_report_log.rep_id = rw_report_main.rep_id left join secuser on rw_report_log.userid = secuser.logid [where] group by rw_report_log.rep_id,func_use,rep_name order by rw_report_log.rep_id

GetReportApplyData4UserRight.Sql: select distinct rw_report_log.rep_id,rep_code,rep_name,class_name,rep_summary,rep_keys,func_use from rw_report_log left join rw_report_main on rw_report_log.rep_id = rw_report_main.rep_id left join secuser on rw_report_log.userid = secuser.logid left join rw_report_class on rw_report_main.rep_classid = rw_report_class.class_id where rw_report_log.rep_id in ( select rep_id from rw_report_rights where u_sort ='01' and {userid1} and rightstr >= '1' union all select rep_id from rw_report_rights where u_sort='04' and userid in( select actorid from fg_useractor where {userid2} and {ocode1}) and rightstr >= '1' union all select rep_id from rw_report_rights where u_sort='02' and userid in( select g_code from fg_guser where {g_id} and {ocode2}) and rightstr >= '1' ) [query] [orderby]

GetReportApplyDataPie4UserRight.Sql: select class_name, rep_classid,COUNT(*) counts from rw_report_log left join rw_report_main on rw_report_log.rep_id = rw_report_main.rep_id left join rw_report_class on rw_report_main.rep_classid = rw_report_class.class_id where rw_report_log.rep_id in ( select rep_id from rw_report_rights where u_sort ='01' and {userid1} and rightstr >= '1' union all select rep_id from rw_report_rights where u_sort='04' and userid in( select actorid from fg_useractor where {userid2} and {ocode1}) and rightstr >= '1' union all select rep_id from rw_report_rights where u_sort='02' and userid in( select g_code from fg_guser where {g_id} and {ocode2}) and rightstr >= '1' ) [query] group by rep_classid,class_name order by class_name
